posts.post_content:
I know it's early still and not many votes are in, but how does [Sanctuary Cat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sanctuary Cat) rate a 4+ and this is <2.5? It has an extra ability and better typing, all at the same mana cost and rarity.  
  
It's quite easy to explain, really. The internet loves cats.
posts.html:
